alert.note: Alert for Larimer (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 4:52PM MDT until August 06 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL LARIMER COUNTY... At 451 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pennock Pass, or 24 miles west of Fort Collins, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Stove Prairie and Mishawaka. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Brief heavy rainfall may lead to localized flooding in the Cameron Peak burn scar. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
